findings.title: Approval racing condition
findings.description: The standard ERC20 implementation contains a widely-known racing condition in its approve function, wherein a spender is able to witness the token owner broadcast a transaction altering their approval, and quickly sign and broadcast a transaction using transferFrom to move the current approved amount from the owner’s balance to the spender.

findings.title: Solidity version must be fixed(Always use latest Version)
findings.description: The Solidity version used in the contract is outdated and should be updated to the latest version.

findings.title: keccak256 encoding behavior
findings.description: The keccak256 function implicitly does encodePacked when accepting multiple arguments, but now it only accepts a single 'bytes' argument and may cause compiler warnings.
